#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#define loop(a,s,e) for(a=s;a<=e;a++)
#define lld long long int
#define debug(format, ...) fprintf(stderr,format,## __VA_ARGS__)
using namespace std;
 
 
inline int input( )
{
    int n=0;
    int ch=getchar_unlocked();
    while( ch >= '0' && ch <= '9' )
    n = (n<<3)+(n<<1) + ch-'0', ch=getchar_unlocked();
    return n;
}
 
bool isPowerOfTwo (unsigned int x)
{
  return ((x != 0) && ((x & (~x + 1)) == x));
}
 
int main()
{
	lld t,n;
	t=input();
	while(t--)
	{
		n=input();
		if(isPowerOfTwo(n))
			printf("No\n");
		else
			printf("Yes\n");
	}
	return 0;
}
